subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: It was about a year ago that Rafael Nadal realized that there was a ceiling to his style. He had mastered tennis on clay but wanted to master tennis on earth. And so began the transformation.
snippet: It was about a year ago that Rafael Nadal realized that there was a ceiling to his style. He had mastered tennis on clay but wanted to master tennis on earth. And so began the transformation.
